DataListSpec.Name: D2 Campaign Business Process Results Report Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Displays the results of the given instance of the D2 Campaign business process.
DataListSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_D2CAMPAIGNBUSINESSPROCESS_RESULTSLIST(@CONTEXTID date) as set nocount on;
select ID , SPONSORLOOKUPID , D2CAMPAIGNDATE , (case when CAMPAIGNTYPE = 0 then 'Cash' when CAMPAIGNTYPE = 1 then 'EFT Active' when CAMPAIGNTYPE = 2 then 'EFT Held' end) as 'TYPE' , D2INTERACTIONSTATUS from dbo.USR_D2_CAMPAIGN_BUSINESSPROCESS_RESULTS where D2CAMPAIGNDATE = Cast(@CONTEXTID as Date)
